data.name: Legacy of Datura
data.detailed_description:
Mix of SciFi & Fantasy

Embark on a magical adventure between a cyberpunk and a medieval world. Defeat enemies and make friends along the way, and keep the deteriorating world safe. Upgrade your skills and your own basement, a haven where you can stay. Enjoy intense gameplay and plot, with nicely paced mini games and puzzles. The story took inspiration from Hong Kong recent historical events, yet the story and characters are purely fictional.


Features

  • Battle with up to 20 different skills, each with 3 upgrades. Combine the use of spells to develop unique play style.
  • Make decisions that decide the fate of characters and the world. A story with 2 endings with minor variations. Your choice matters.
  • Upgrade basement to unlock new activities and side-quests. A safe place to chill albeit the storms outside.
  • Play puzzle-solving tasks and mini-games along the journey.

data.short_description: Embark on a magical adventure between a cyberpunk and a medieval world. A 2D fantasy inspired by Hong Kong recent historical events.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:

  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
